testcase.name: Create booking
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * def body = .............................................................. passed Given path 'booking' ...................................................... passed And request body .......................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.booking.firstname contains 'Jim' ....................... passed And match response.booking.lastname contains 'Brown' ...................... passed And match response.booking.totalprice contains 111 ........................ passed And match response.booking.depositpaid contains true ...................... passed And match response.booking.bookingdates.checkin contains '2018-01-01' ..... passed And match response.booking.bookingdates.checkout contains '2019-01-01' .... passed And match response.booking.additionalneeds contains 'Breakfast' ........... passed
